snippet: As part of the settlement, the biotechnology company Agios Pharmaceuticals entered licensing agreements covering certain intellectual property with the University of Pennsylvania.
abstract: Two lawsuits accusing Dr Craig B Thompson of absconding with groundbreaking research from the University of Pennsylvania to start biotechnology company Agios Pharmaceuticals are settled; suits accused Thompson, now the president of Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, of hiding his use of research he conducted while working at the university.
lead_paragraph: As part of the settlement, the biotechnology company Agios Pharmaceuticals entered licensing agreements covering certain intellectual property with the University of Pennsylvania.

headline.seo: Lawsuits Related to Founding of Agios Pharmaceuticals Are Settled
headline.main: Suits That Accused Sloan-Kettering Chief of Stealing Research Are Settled
headline.print_headline: Suits That Accused Sloan-Kettering Chief of Stealing Research Are Settled
